about_the_game:
A gigantic asset of thousands of RPG icons (around 7800+ icons), two years of work together in a single pack! This asset is a combination of all CWR icon sets previously made, with many reworks, recolors, remakes, and even new stuff.

Features:

* All sprites come in 16x16, 24x24, 32x32, and 64x64. with a dark outline. Raven Fantasy Style. All sizes are a perfect scale up except 24x24 which can be used but are not a perfect scale and will show some imperfect pixels.

* A Good part of this asset is an update of older assets, so if you have previously acquired some of CWR iconsets, you may find it inside. The oldest ones were updated to fit the design better.

* Classic 16x16 Pixel art style, can match most RPGs.

* 16 square grid ready to use a sprite sheet, to Match with RPG Maker XP, VX, VX ace, MV, and MZ.

* Not only in a "sprite sheet" but all images come in separate png files.


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
